response.overview: Victor, a disillusioned 60-something whose marriage is on the rocks, opts to relive the week of his life when, 40 years earlier, he met his true love through a company that allows customers to return to the time period of their choosing.
response.tagline: If you could live your own life again, would you do it?
response.title: La Belle Époque

release_dates.note: Film by the Sea Film Festival

results.name: La Belle Époque - Official Trailer - In Theatres Dec 13
